positions.subtitle: ExxonMobil
positions.description: Develop in-depth insights on an $80 billion Upstream portfolio, providing critical context for high-impact investment decisions.Engaged in Competitive Intelligence, Exploration, and New Ventures initiatives, delivering actionable insights to support portfolio-wide growth and innovation.Streamlined financial modeling processes for 3 assets, reducing latency by 45% and accelerating repricing and recalculation times by 60%, significantly improving operational efficiency. Designed and executed economic models using Workday and Excel-based stream tools, performing rigorous probabilistic and sensitivity analyses to support fiscal forecasting.
positions.title: Business Analyst- Planning & Stewardship LNG Business Line
positions.description_html:
Develop in-depth insights on an $80 billion Upstream portfolio, providing critical context for high-impact investment decisions.

Engaged in Competitive Intelligence, Exploration, and New Ventures initiatives, delivering actionable insights to support portfolio-wide growth and innovation.

Streamlined financial modeling processes for 3 assets, reducing latency by 45% and accelerating repricing and recalculation times by 60%, significantly improving operational efficiency.

Designed and executed economic models using Workday and Excel-based stream tools, performing rigorous probabilistic and sensitivity analyses to support fiscal forecasting.

positions.subtitle: ExxonMobil
positions.description: -Provided cost, schedule, progress measurement, and change management expertise to oversee a $350 million project portfolio. My responsibilities extended across all phases, from engineering and procurement to installation and turnover to operations.-Provided Execution support as a Project Engineer/manager for 10 months and led the project to completion.-Guiding key stakeholders, I facilitated the optimization of execution plans, and strategies, culminating in well-defined budget estimates, schedules, and work breakdown structures. These efforts ensured efficient project delivery, meeting objectives with precision and excellence.-As a Networking Team Chair, I adeptly managed a diverse 10-member group, fostering global collaboration and orchestrating impactful networking events and skill-building workshops for an extensive workforce of over 1000 employees spread across multiple locations.-Played a pivotal role in enhancing organizational efficiency by developing and refining Power BI tools and dashboards. This initiative resulted in a reduction of more than 10K work hours annually, making a tangible impact on productivity and resource allocation.
positions.title: Cost Schedule & Controls Engineer
positions.description_html:
-Provided cost, schedule, progress measurement, and change management expertise to oversee a $350 million project portfolio. My responsibilities extended across all phases, from engineering and procurement to installation and turnover to operations.

-Provided Execution support as a Project Engineer/manager for 10 months and led the project to completion.

-Guiding key stakeholders, I facilitated the optimization of execution plans, and strategies, culminating in well-defined budget estimates, schedules, and work breakdown structures. These efforts ensured efficient project delivery, meeting objectives with precision and excellence.

-As a Networking Team Chair, I adeptly managed a diverse 10-member group, fostering global collaboration and orchestrating impactful networking events and skill-building workshops for an extensive workforce of over 1000 employees spread across multiple locations.

-Played a pivotal role in enhancing organizational efficiency by developing and refining Power BI tools and dashboards. This initiative resulted in a reduction of more than 10K work hours annually, making a tangible impact on productivity and resource allocation.

experience.title: Strategic Development Specialist
experience.description: We are a biotechnology company building sustainable alternatives for major plastic-pollution cases. The team comprises a group of Biotechnologists, Chemical Engineers, and bioprocess specialists from the premier Indian Institutes, with a drive and mission to solve environmental issues. We also provide consultation to other companies who want to venture in the clean tech domain. Due to our technical background and immense experience with biomaterials, we are well equipped to handle all your consulting requirements.

experience.title: Team Lead
experience.description: We have made a Shoe-box sized car that runs and stops on Chemical Reactions. We had first presented our Car in American Institute Of Chemical Engineers (AIChE) SRC CHEM-E-CAR National Qualifiers 2018.We understand our Responsibility and thus have conducted a hands-on workshop for nearly 70 students and a mock competition.We have presented our car in several Exhibitions and Fests too , to inspire young minds to take interest in Chemical Engineering.Currently we are researching on innovative Propulsion, Stopping and Design Solutions with our proud and active team members.For more Information:Contactshivasheesh2098@gmail.com

publications: [{"title":"Going through the Disruptive Transformations in Chemical Industrial Practices : Impact of Expert Systems and Artificial Intelligence on Automation and Decision Making","subtitle":"AICHE ANNUAL MEETING 2019 Fl, USA Proceedings","date":"November 1, 2019","description":"It was published as a part of AICHE ANNUAL MEETING 2019 Fl, USA Proceedings"}]
projects: [{"title":"Polymer Dialysis Device","start_date":"Jun 2019","end_date":"Present","description":"Fabrication of a Polymer based device to meet Artificial Kidney characteristics.Started this Project in Collaboration with CMET, Min. of Electronics.Got funding from the Government for this Project."},{"title":"Portable Green Energy Desaliniser","start_date":"Jan 2019","end_date":"Present","description":"It works on the principle of Solar Dehumidification.Its design includes a vessel that floats on a waterbody and produces clean drinkable water.Received grants from the Kerala Government to prototype and develop it further."},{"title":"CHEM-E-CAR","start_date":"May 2018","end_date":"Nov 2018","description":"It is a box sized Car that is powered by Chemical Reactions and stops accurately due to chemical reaction after covering the desired distance. In our First prototype, we used Thermoelectric generators that converts the temperature different between an exothermic reaction and dry ice to electric current.For Stopping Mechanism we had used Iodine Clock Reaction."},{"title":"Signature Verification System Using Neural Networks ","start_date":"Apr 2018","end_date":"May 2018","description":"Implementation of a Convulational Neural Network in a 2 layer network .Implemented and trained on Anaconda in Python."}]
